titleStmt.title: Iter boreale. The second part relating the progress of the Lord General Monk, calling in the secluded members, their voting King Charls the second home, his joyfull reception at Dover, and his glorious conduct through London, to his royal palace at Whitehall / by T.H., a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: T. H. (Person of quality)

notesStmt.note: To the tune of "When first the Scottish wars began.".
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University Library.
